summary: A young man awakens from a six-year coma with the ability to see into peoples futures.
cast: Anthony Michael Hall|Nicole de Boer|Chris Bruno|John L. Adams|Rick Tae|Kristen Dalton|Anna Hagan|Gina Chiarelli|Michael J Rogers|David Ogden Stiers|Emily Holmes|John Hainsworth|Campbell Lane|Justin Stillwell|Kenya Jo Kennedy|Tyler Williamson|Daniel Williamson|Janet Saint James|Beverley Breuer|Nicole LaPlaca|Mercedes de la Zerda|Fran Gebhard|Chris Kelly|Michael St. John Smith|Liliane Lee|Diana Ha|Bryce Hodgson|Bill Mondy|Dominic Louis|Evan Smith|Victoria Billingsley|Nicholas Lee|Marke Driesschen|Donald Fong|Janina Dall|Ed Chow|Chris Lawrence|Willis Taylor
title: The Dead Zone
